Name: Arlan
Desc: The head of Herta Space Station's Security Department.\nThis quiet boy hopes to protect the researchers who value their pursuit of knowledge, and to help them to complete their work.

1.Name: To the Bitter End
1.Desc: When HP percentage is lower than or equal to <unbreak>50%</unbreak> of Max HP, increases DMG dealt by Skill by <unbreak>#1[i]%</unbreak>.

2.Name: Breaking Free
2.Desc: Using Skill or Ultimate removes 1 debuff from oneself.

3.Name: Power Through
3.Desc: Skill Lv. +2, up to a maximum of Lv. <unbreak>15</unbreak>.\nBasic ATK Lv. +1, up to a maximum of Lv. <unbreak>10</unbreak>.

4.Name: Turn the Tables
4.Desc: When struck by a killing blow after entering battle, instead of becoming knocked down, Arlan immediately restores his HP to <unbreak>#1[i]%</unbreak> of his Max HP. This effect is automatically removed after it is triggered once or after <unbreak>#2[i]</unbreak> turn(s) have elapsed.

5.Name: Hammer and Tongs
5.Desc: Ultimate Lv. +2, up to a maximum of Lv. <unbreak>15</unbreak>.\nTalent Lv. +2, up to a maximum of Lv. <unbreak>15</unbreak>.

6.Name: Self-Sacrifice
6.Desc: When the current HP percentage drops to <unbreak>50%</unbreak> or below, Ultimate deals <unbreak>#1[i]%</unbreak> more DMG, and the DMG multiplier for adjacent targets is raised to the same level as that for the primary target.

100801.Name: Lightning Rush
100801.Desc: Deals Lightning DMG equal to <color=#f29e38ff><unbreak>#1[i]%</unbreak></color> of Arlan's ATK to a single enemy.

100802.Name: Shackle Breaker
100802.Desc: Consumes Arlan's HP equal to <unbreak>#1[i]%</unbreak> of his Max HP to deal Lightning DMG equal to <color=#f29e38ff><unbreak>#2[i]%</unbreak></color> of Arlan's ATK to a single enemy. If Arlan does not have sufficient HP, his HP will be reduced to 1 after using his Skill.

100803.Name: Frenzied Punishment
100803.Desc: Deals Lightning DMG equal to <color=#f29e38ff><unbreak>#1[i]%</unbreak></color> of Arlan's ATK to a single enemy and Lightning DMG equal to <color=#f29e38ff><unbreak>#2[i]%</unbreak></color> of Arlan's ATK to enemies adjacent to it.

100804.Name: Pain and Anger
100804.Desc: Based on Arlan's current missing HP percentage, gains DMG bonus, up to a maximum increase of <color=#f29e38ff><unbreak>#1[i]%</unbreak></color> DMG dealt by Arlan.

100806.Name: Attack
100806.Desc: Attacks an enemy, and when the battle starts, reduces their Toughness of the corresponding Type.

100807.Name: Swift Harvest
100807.Desc: Immediately attacks the enemy. After entering battle, deals Lightning DMG equal to <unbreak>#1[i]%</unbreak> of Arlan's ATK to all enemies.

1.PointDesc: If the current HP percentage is <unbreak>#1[i]%</unbreak> or lower when defeating an enemy, immediately restores HP equal to <unbreak>#2[i]%</unbreak> of Max HP.
The chance to resist DoT Debuffs increases by <unbreak>#1[i]%</unbreak>.
Upon entering battle, if Arlan's HP percentage is less than or equal to <unbreak>#1[i]%</unbreak>, he can nullify all DMG received except for DoTs until he is attacked.
